result.execSummary:
The defendant Leeaire Mathis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Leeaire Mathis is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Leeaire Mathis was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct - Domestic Abuse Repeater [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Repeater], an unclassified felony, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  DE is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
Spend 8 months in the county jail w/huber privileges, commencing 11/28/15.  Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  DOC shall promptly notify the Court, in writing, of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the Deft.

timeConds.notes: w/Huber privileges.  It is the Court's expectation that all non-working hours are to be spent in the KCJ subject to the authority granted to the Sheriff under the Statutes.

Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Carmen Ayres.  Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for two years.  See conditions.  Deft sentenced to 8mos KCJ as a condition of probation.  Huber is allowed.  It is the Court's expectation that all non-working hours are to be spent in the KCJ subject to the authority granted to the Sheriff under the Statutes.  Appeal rights.  DNA ordered;  notice given to deft.
Sentencing hearing at 11-16-2015 03:30 pm
Sentencing hearing at 11-02-2015 03:00 pm

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty Carmen Lassiter appeared on behalf of deft.  No appearance by deft.  Atty Lassiter reports the deft did not have transportation to the hrg today; he received the notice of today's hrg at a late notice.  Sentencing hrg adj to 11/2/15 @ 3pm.
Defense counsel out ill - sentencing hrg moved to 10/15/15 @ 2:45pm.  Email sent to attys

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Lassiter.  Victim rights compliance.  Deft pleads guilty to count 2; found guilty by the Court.  Admits to Domestic Abuse repeater.  Count 1 is dismissed on State's motion.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 10/12/15 @ 3pm.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State. Def. appeared in court with Atty. Carmen Lassiter. Clerk LE.   Plea offer placed on the record by the State.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Request for substitution of Judge Wagner filed by Atty. Lassiter. Tab pulled for Judge Schroeder. Bound over to Br. 3. Information filed, plea of not guilty. Judicial pretrial on 8-26-15 @ 9:20am. Jury selection on 10-5-15 @ 9:00am. Note: Atty. Lassiter is not available for JS on 10-5 and will contact clerk to reschedule. Bond continued.
